boardgame.name: Squiggle Game
Tsuro
boardgame.description: From the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A beautiful and beautifully simple game of laying a tile before your own token to continue its path on each turn. The goal is to keep your token on the board longer than anyone else's, but as the board fills up this becomes harder because there are fewer empty spaces left... and another player's tile may also extend your own path in a direction you'd rather not go. Easy to introduce to new players, Tsuro lasts a mere 15 minutes and actually does work for any number from 2 to 8._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Theme:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Tsuro has an Asian spiritual theme - the lines representing the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;many roads that lead to divine wisdom_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, and the game as a whole representing _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;the classic quest for enlightenment_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This theme is very light and the game essentially plays as an abstract._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Gameplay:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game consists of tiles with twisting lines on them, a 6x6 grid on which to lay these tiles and a token for each player. Each player has a hand of tiles. On your turn you do two things: place a tile from your hand onto the board next to your token and move your token as far as it can go along the line it is currently on, until it is stopped by an empty space with no tile in (yet), the edge of the board or colliding with another player's token. If your token reaches the edge of the board or collides with another player's token, you are out of the game. The aim of the game is to be the last player left with a token on the board. Strategy therefore consists of trying to drive your opponents either into each other or off the board whilst extending your own route in directions that will make it difficult for your opponents to do the same._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Other notes:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Tsuro was originally patented by McMurchie in 1979 under the name Squiggle Game, but was apparently not published at that time. Somewhat similar to Metro and Spaghetti Junction._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Tsuro (WizKids) This game is brand new and sealed. S_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;H through UPS Ground is $7.00 in the 48 states. We can combine shipping on multiple purchases. We collect 8.25% sales tax for TX orders. For more games go to www.NewSpiel.com

This game is brand new and manufacturer sealed. Combined shipping may be available on multiple purchases. Other shipping arrangements are available upon request but may vary in cost. Pennsylvania shipping addresses should include 6% sales tax. **VERY FAST SHIPPING - 2-4 business days once payment received**

Game is brand new with publisher shrink-wrap. Save $4 off list price of $24.99! Items are shipped within one business day of receiving payment. If you do not wish to use PayPal, you may pay me directly (via website or phone) using any major credit card. Shipping is $7.00 for UPS Ground to US locations (no PO Boxes, AK or HI). If you need a different type of shipping or any questions answered, please email before purchasing. CA orders pay 7.25% sales tax. For more info visit www.gamesinabox.com.

Game is brand new with publisher shrink-wrap. Save 30% or more off of every item we have listed on Boardgamegeek.com! Items are shipped within one or two business days upon reciept of payment (remember, money order, cashier_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s check or cash at your own risk!) If you do not wish to send payment and would rather pay us directly, you can give us a call at 816.554.7333 using Visa, Mastercard and American Express (a 7.35% tax will be added to the total payment.) Shipping is $8.00 for USPS Priority to US locations (no PO Boxes, AK or HI). If you need a different type of shipping (such as Overseas!!!) or any questions answered, please email before purchasing. MO orders pay 7.35% sales tax. For more info about the store visit www.pfcomics.com (be sure to check out our forums for events going on at the store!).
Shipping is 7.80$ within U.S., insurance 1.35$ optional.

New and factory fresh We are a small, family owned and operated game shoppe. Like you, we simply love board games! Your new Tsuro game will be shipped to you via USPS PRIORITY 2-3 day mail for only $7.49. International orders, please inquire with us about shipping costs before ordering. Thank you, J and J Board Games
